title: Adding BEP-2 to BEP-20 swap function on Buckswap.io
body:
To attract more users to the platform and to generate economic traction for
Buckswap, the proposal is to add a quick swap function from BEP-2 to BEP-20 (similar to that available on trust wallet). 

Function can be achieved by partnering up with existing platforms/solutions such as multichain.org or be developed in house by the buckswap team (which can be voted separately if the proposal passes).
author: 0xd0e08a720A1e225a42165Cbb50493FB70f31f7b2
